short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for adding custom CSS and JS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web sauce gives you the ability to add custom CSS and JavaScript to web pages.

New in version 0.3.1:
- Bug fixes.

Source code: https://github.com/soslan/web-sauce
